abstract: Republicans released a video trying to use Representative Steve Israel's support of the "Occupy Wall Street" movement against him.
snippet: Republicans released a video trying to use Representative Steve Israel's support of the "Occupy Wall Street" movement against him.
lead_paragraph: It's the time of year for candy corn and horror flicks, so mistaking a new web advertisement attacking Representative Steve Israel for a film trailer about socialist zombies would be understandable.

headline.main: Democrat Is Attacked for Supporting Protesters
